title: Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima Pilot

synonyms: Sindbad: The Flying Princess and the Secret Island Pilot Video
Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima Pilot Eizou
alternative_titles.ja: シンドバッド 空とぶ姫と秘密の島　パイロット映像

synopsis: Sinbad: Soratobu Hime to Himitsu no Shima pilot footage included with the DVD release. It features Sana's chase scene in which Sinbad first interacts with her. The footage was not recycled for the film and no dialogue is used.
